localResource.name: host_multiselect
localResource.label: host_multiselect
localResource.queryString: SELECT distinct delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN RTrim(cast(host_name as nvarchar)) ELSE RTrim(cast(host_name as nvarchar)) + ' (Removed on ' + convert(nvarchar, delete_date, 103) + ')' END as combo_name, host_id FROM v3_0_host_configuration_view Where v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id in (SELECT v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.cluster_id FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.datacenter_id = $P{P_DataCenter_ID}) AND v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' then v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id ELSE $P{P_Cluster_ID} END AND v3_0_host_configuration_view.host_type = CASE $P{P_Host_Type} WHEN -1 THEN v3_0_host_configuration_view.host_type WHEN NULL THEN v3_0_host_configuration_view.host_type ELSE $P{P_Host_Type} END $P!{Active_VMs} order by delete_date DESC, combo_name
